r.s: OO interface to modify and handle HTTP headers and status codes.
r.d: This class provides methods to set/modify HTTP headers and status codes including an HTTP caching facility. It also provides methods for checking Status types.
r.n: * Call parent constructor in HTTP_Header_Cache * Fixed Bug in HTTP_Header_Cache::isCached() * Fixed Bug #1908 (added optional parameter $session to redirect()) + Added PHPUnit test cases
